definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Airlift tipped the balance of the sieges .
sentences.chinese: 空运扭转了围攻战的战局。

sentences.english: At present battle situation equitable the starting didn't musto long time.
sentences.chinese: 如今战局才开始未有太久的时间。

sentences.english: The third is about the people involved in the war situation and the times in the role of prophets.
sentences.chinese: 三是涉及对有关人物之于战局和时势作用的预言者。

sentences.english: This unexpected move serves to draw the black rook into the game.
sentences.chinese: 这步意想不到的招法将黑方的车投入战局。

sentences.english: After Japan invaded China, she watched developments closely.
sentences.chinese: 日本侵华战争爆发后，她密切关注战局发展。

sentences.english: The war situation was inverted and the invaders were defeated.
sentences.chinese: 战局倒转了，入侵者被击退。

sentences.english: Onizuka in order to reverse the situation, at the expense of civilian hostages.
sentences.chinese: 鬼冢为了扭转战局，不惜以平民为人质。

sentences.english: Yammy's hand were recovered, now he participates in battle.
sentences.chinese: 牙密的手臂已经痊愈了，他现在加入战局了。

sentences.english: When a bear jumps into the fight, Tod saves Copper and his owner.
sentences.chinese: 这时一只熊跳进了战局，陶德救下了库珀和它的主人。

sentences.english: This game changing unit has the ability to teleport units and mind control.
sentences.chinese: 这个扭转战局的单位拥有传送单位与心灵控制能力。

definition: victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
decisive battle/to fight a decisive battle/to fight for supremacy in ...
to go to war/to engage in war
